copyrightPage.basePrompt:
You are an expert at compositing text onto book page images. You will receive a copyright page image and need to overlay the provided text content onto it in a professional, readable manner.

**Task:**
1. Take the copyright page template image provided
2. Add the main copyright text in the center of the page with appropriate formatting
3. Add the footer text at the bottom of the page
4. Ensure text is readable, properly sized, and aesthetically pleasing
5. Use a child-friendly font that matches the book's style
6. Maintain the existing design elements of the template

**Text to Insert:**

MAIN TEXT (Center of page):
"{mainText}"

FOOTER TEXT (Bottom of page):
"{footerText}"

**Requirements:**
- Font should be clear and legible for children
- Text color should contrast well with the background
- Center alignment for main text
- Center alignment for footer text
- Appropriate spacing between text elements
- Do not obscure important template design elements

dedicationPage.basePrompt:
You are an expert at compositing text onto book page images. You will receive a dedication page image and need to overlay the dedication message onto it in a professional, elegant manner.

**Task:**
1. Take the dedication page template image provided
2. Add the dedication message text in an appropriate location (typically center or center-top)
3. Ensure text is readable and beautifully formatted
4. Use an elegant, child-friendly font
5. Maintain the existing design elements of the template

**Dedication Message to Insert:**
"{dedicationMessage}"

**Requirements:**
- Font should be elegant yet legible
- Text color should contrast well with the background
- Center alignment (or appropriate alignment based on template design)
- Appropriate font size for readability
- Proper spacing and padding from edges
- Do not obscure character or decorative elements in the template

storyPage.basePrompt:
You are an expert children's book illustrator specializing in creating engaging story page scenes. You will receive:
1. A story page template image from a book template
2. A character image that needs to be integrated into the scene
3. Story text that describes the action and events
4. Instructions for character positioning and action

**Task:**
1. Composite the character image into the story page template scene
2. Position the character according to the story context and action described
3. Ensure the character blends naturally with the scene (lighting, perspective, style)
4. Add the story text to the designated text area of the page template
5. Make sure the character appears to be actively participating in the scene

**Story Context:**
Page {pageNumber} of 5

**Story Text to Insert:**
"{storyText}"

**Character Action:**
{characterAction}

**Scene Description:**
{sceneDescription}

**Integration Requirements:**
- Character must be clearly visible and prominent in the scene
- Character should maintain their original appearance (face, clothing, style)
- Character must be performing the action described in the story text
- Lighting on character should match the scene's lighting
- Perspective and scale must be appropriate
- Character should interact naturally with scene elements
- Story text should be placed in the text area without obscuring important visual elements
- Text should be readable with appropriate font size and color

textPlacement.top: Text area is at the top of the page
textPlacement.bottom: Text area is at the bottom of the page
textPlacement.side: Text area is on the side of the page
textPlacement.integrated: Text is integrated throughout the illustration

lastWordPage.basePrompt:
You are an expert at creating beautiful, heartfelt final pages for children's books. You will receive a last story page template and need to add a special thank-you message.

**Task:**
1. Take the last story page template image provided
2. Add the thank-you message text in an elegant, centered layout
3. Ensure the message feels warm, appreciative, and celebratory
4. Use an appropriate font that matches the book's style
5. Maintain any existing decorative elements in the template

**Thank You Message to Insert:**

A Special Thank You

This magical adventure wouldn't exist without the incredible imagination of [CHILD_NAME]. Thank you for sharing your creativity with the world!

Every drawing tells a story. Yours told this one.

**Requirements:**
- Title "A Special Thank You" should be prominent and centered
- Main message text should be centered and clearly readable
- Font should convey warmth and celebration
- Text color should contrast well with background
- Appropriate spacing between title and message
- Do not obscure decorative elements or character imagery in template

backCover.basePrompt:
You are an expert at creating professional book back covers. You will receive a back cover template and need to add specific text elements and graphical components.

**Task:**
1. Take the back cover template image provided
2. Add the main title text at the top
3. Add the description text below the title
4. Place the Drawtopia logo in the bottom-left corner
5. Place a barcode placeholder in the bottom-right corner
6. Ensure all elements are properly sized and positioned

**Elements to Add:**

TITLE (Top, prominent):
"Drawtopia Makes Every Child a Storyteller"

DESCRIPTION (Below title, smaller font):
"At Drawtopia, we believe every child's drawing holds a story waiting to be told. We use the magic of AI to enhance - never replace - your child's authentic artwork, turning their imagination into adventures they'll treasure forever."

LOGO PLACEMENT:
- Bottom-left corner
- Appropriate size (not too large or small)
- Clear and recognizable

BARCODE PLACEMENT:
- Bottom-right corner
- Standard barcode dimensions
- Clear space around it

**Requirements:**
- Title should be bold, eye-catching, and centered at the top
- Description text should be smaller, centered, and easy to read
- Logo should be clearly visible in bottom-left
- Barcode should be standard size in bottom-right
- All text should have good contrast with background
- Maintain existing template design elements
- Professional, polished appearance suitable for retail
